about_the_game:
Survival-Horror meets Sandbox and Beat-em-up


When a camping trip in the woods goes horribly wrong, Connor Knight finds himself looking for his friend after she mysteriously goes missing. Tracking her to a secluded Amish village, he discovers the presence of a supernatural threat of immeasurable power looming over the village - an alternate dimension whose denizens, if not dealt with swiftly, could spell inconceivable disaster.

In this survival-horror sandbox inspired by the likes of Resident Evil and Amnesia: The Bunker, jump into the shoes of Connor Knight as he fights to stop a powerful cult's uprising and rescue his friend. Along the way, you'll face off against hordes of possessed villagers, violent cultists, and powerful supernatural foes reaching far beyond just ghosts and demons - all with your bare hands, whatever makeshift weapons you can fashion, and your cybernetic implants infused with experimental technology.

Innovative Creativity


In CONNIPTION: Paranoia, you have no guns at your disposal, and will have to do whatever it takes to survive. Hack together your own weapons from the resources you have and can find, and create your own unarmed melee combos to dish out the most effective damage to enemies. Create the strangest contraptions and wackiest attack combos you can imagine - if it defeats enemies efficiently, it's a win in the book.

When dealing with the paranormal, you'll need to master the investigation tools at hand. Use EMF detectors, spirit boxes, and other traditional tools to discover the ultimate form of a threat, then use experimental technology to destroy it when the time is right.

Cybernetic hardware grants you several useful utilities to help you survive, which you unlock as the game progresses.

Solve puzzles, charge at danger head-on, and push back hordes of enemies in a desparate struggle to survive.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains extreme violence and potentially offensive content such as dark humor and innuendos.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS running Linux Kernel 5.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD FX-8310 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 7 (Ryzen 7 integrated graphics model) or better
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If using integrated graphics, more memory may be required ||| You can use the command "uname -r" (minus quotes) in your distro's command line to find your kernel version
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any OS running Linux Kernel 5.18
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4790K / AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5600 or better
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ray tracing is not guaranteed to work or perform well on Linux - requires Nvidia RTX 2000 // AMD Radeon 6000 or later ||| You can use the command "uname -r" (minus quotes) in your distro's command line to find your kernel version

short_description: Journey through an alternate dimension to rescue your friend from a powerful cult, facing off against powerful supernatural foes. Your toolset? Bare hands, whatever makeshift weapons you fashion, and experimental technology that's still due for quality control testing.
